name: Subbania
description:
Taking up a top secret war mission, your crew becomes lost in an unknown world...

Subbania is about a crew of Nazis assigned to lead a preemptive strike against America's fleet, but wind up in a world they don't understand. They'll face countless monsters--some good, many bad, a few morally neutral--in the journey out.

Explore the depths of these caverns and attempt to discover how and why you got there.

Note: Arrows keys control movement with Z/X/C controlling action and Enter pausing. X rushes through cutscenes. Enter/return skips cutscenes.
